description: Dialogs are overlaid modal paper based components with a backdrop.

aria-describedby.description: The id(s) of the element(s) that describe the dialog.

aria-labelledby.description: The id(s) of the element(s) that label the dialog.

children.description: Dialog children, usually the included sub-components.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

disableBackdropClick.description: If `true`, clicking the backdrop will not fire the `onClose` callback.

disableEscapeKeyDown.description: If `true`, hitting escape will not fire the `onClose` callback.

fullScreen.description: If `true`, the dialog will be full-screen

fullWidth.description:
If `true`, the dialog stretches to `maxWidth`.

Notice that the dialog width grow is limited by the default margin.

maxWidth.description:
Determine the max-width of the dialog.
The dialog width grows with the size of the screen.
Set to `false` to disable `maxWidth`.

onBackdropClick.description: Callback fired when the backdrop is clicked.

onClose.description: Callback fired when the component requests to be closed.

tags.title: param
tags.description: The event source of the callback.
tags.name: event

onEnter.description: Callback fired before the dialog enters.

onEntered.description: Callback fired when the dialog has entered.

onEntering.description: Callback fired when the dialog is entering.

onEscapeKeyDown.description:
Callback fired when the escape key is pressed,
`disableKeyboard` is false and the modal is in focus.

onExit.description: Callback fired before the dialog exits.

onExited.description: Callback fired when the dialog has exited.

onExiting.description: Callback fired when the dialog is exiting.

PaperComponent.description: The component used to render the body of the dialog.

scroll.description: Determine the container for scrolling the dialog.

TransitionComponent.description:
The component used for the transition.
[Follow this guide](/components/transitions/#transitioncomponent-prop) to learn more about the requirements for this component.

transitionDuration.description:
The duration for the transition, in milliseconds.
You may specify a single timeout for all transitions, or individually with an object.

name: Dialog

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.scrollPaper: Styles applied to the container element if `scroll="paper"`.
descriptions.scrollBody: Styles applied to the container element if `scroll="body"`.
descriptions.container: Styles applied to the container element.
descriptions.paperScrollPaper: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `scroll="paper"`.
descriptions.paperScrollBody: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `scroll="body"`.
descriptions.paperWidthFalse: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `maxWidth=false`.
descriptions.paperWidthXs: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `maxWidth="xs"`.
descriptions.paperWidthSm: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `maxWidth="sm"`.
descriptions.paperWidthMd: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `maxWidth="md"`.
descriptions.paperWidthLg: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `maxWidth="lg"`.
descriptions.paperWidthXl: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `maxWidth="xl"`.
descriptions.paperFullWidth: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `fullWidth={true}`.
descriptions.paperFullScreen: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `fullScreen={true}`.
